North_Richland_Hills.Haltom High School:
Haltom High School is a grade 9-12 high school located in Haltom City, Texas.


== History ==
Haltom High School completed expansions in 2010 that began in 2007. The expansion made room for another gym, a blackbox theater, a choir room, a band hall, percussion room, color guard room, and more classrooms.
